message: Let's start with a fair offer. I take a bit more considering the inflation.
Your share decreases every round with inflation. Let's be reasonable and split it fairly.
Bob, I'm losing money with every round we play. My offer is still generous considering.
Alice, this is getting us nowhere. I'm meeting you halfway now. Take it before inflation eats your share even more.
Bob, I need to make up for the inflation. This is my final offer!
Alright, Alice.  Let's stop wasting time.  I'm increasing my offer again.  Take this deal before it's too late!
